name: Bond Wire
description:
Will you be able to survive the different test chambers only equiped with the Bond Wire?

The standalone version (at the bottom of this page) behaves a little better. If you find yourself missing your swings in the browser version, give it a try.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • RIGHT CLICK on midair to AIR BOOST
  • LEFT CLICK to fire make an attachment and swing!
  • LEFT CLICK while attached to free yourself
  • RIGHT CLICK while attached to shorten the bond
  • CENTER CLICK white attached to enlarge the bond

Made by Ebediam (except the wonderful music!)

Music: "Keep alive" by Maitheas

Programs used:

-Unity

-Blender

-Bfxr

-VoiceChanger

-Bosca Ceoil
